Description: The date of the recorded data.

The Standard & Poor's 500 (S&P 500) Index value, which represents the performance of 500 large publicly traded companies in the U.S. stock market. It serves as a benchmark for overall market performance and investor sentiment.
The price of gold (GLD ETF) on the given date.
The price of crude oil (USO ETF) on the given date.
The price of silver (SLV ETF) on the given date.
The exchange rate of the Euro to US Dollar on the given date.
